lines:
kan

d

ead 
Camar, Ole

Received 3/6 
Answered ? 
File Kerana 
macch 6,1919.

My dear Do Steams,

am gona 2 
shead a week-end lwith me 
dud nurs. Lynde this week 
and I hope t have it 
pleasure in seeing you 
leiter sathday cakning 
Sendayd

d you will probably the 
ulurted U to Kuow that eleven 
mars ago This Saturday was to 
first time I had it 
pleasure to meet you at
raw: kan d ead Camar, Ole Received 3/6 Answered ? File Kerana macch 6,1919. My dear Do Steams, am gona 2 shead a week-end lwith me dud nurs. Lynde this week and I hope t have it pleasure in seeing you leiter sathday cakning Sendayd d you will probably the ulurted U to Kuow that eleven mars ago This Saturday was to first time I had it pleasure to meet you at

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter about spending a weekend with Mr. and Mrs. Lynde and mentioning that it was eleven years ago that Kwan met Stearns At Dummer Academy (March 9, 1908), expressing the hope that they would again visit Dummer in a few days.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
